author: Edward-Isaac Dovere, CNN
title: Inside Biden's decision to pick Ketanji Brown Jackson for Supreme Court
description: President Joe Biden's choice of Ketanji Brown Jackson for the Supreme Court came about like so many of his big decisions: after a long process, with a lot of wavering and discussion, and ultimately landing right where he had been headed from the outset.
